001package Calibration_Plugins_1;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
006import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
007import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
008import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
009import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.CalibrationImage;
010import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.ZhangData;
011import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
012import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
013import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
014import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
015
016import java.awt.Shape;
017import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
018import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
019import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.splitLines;
024
025
026/**
027 * This plugin projects opens an image stack containing the 5 Zhang test images, then outlines the positions of the
028 * observed image points and finally projects the points of the calibration model using the calculated intrinsic camera
029 * parameters (same for all views) and the extrinsic parameters calculated for each view. All data are part of Zhang's
030 * demo data set that comes with the EasyCalib program. NO CALIBRATION is performed here!
031 * Graphic elements are drawn as non-destructive vector overlays:
032 * <ul>
033 * <li>BLUE circles: observed corner points (used for calibration), </li>
034 * <li>RED markers: the model reference points projected using the documented intrinsic camera and view parameters.</li>
035 * </ul>
036 * LOOK CLOSELY / ZOOM IN! The complete image stack with overlay can be saved as a TIFF file.
037 *
038 * @author WB
039 * @version 2022/12/19
040 */
041public class Validate_EasyCalib_Data implements PlugIn {
042        
043        private static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack;
044        private static BasicAwtColor ProjectedModelColor = BasicAwtColor.Red;
045        private static BasicAwtColor CornerMarkColor = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
046        private static double CornerMarkRadius = 2.0;
047        private static double StrokeWidth  = 0.5;
048
049        public void run(String arg0) {
050                ImagePlus testIm = resource.getImagePlus();
051                if (testIm == null) {
052                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!"); 
053                        return;
054                }
055                testIm.show();
056
057                if (!runDialog()) {
058                        return;
059                }
060                
061                final int M = testIm.getNSlices();
062                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
063
064
065                Point2D[] modelPoints = ZhangData.getModelPoints();                             // get the reference model points
066                Camera camReal = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();                               // get the (known) camera intrinsics
067                ViewTransform[] viewsReal = ZhangData.getAllViewTransforms();   // get the (known) camera views
068                if (viewsReal.length != M) {
069                        IJ.error("Wrong number of view transforms: " + viewsReal.length);
070                        return;
071                }
072
073                // project and draw the model's reference squares:
074                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, ProjectedModelColor.getColor()));
075                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
076                        int sliceNo = i + 1;
077                        ola.setStackPosition(sliceNo);
078                        Point2D[] projPnts = camReal.project(viewsReal[i], modelPoints);
079                        //for (Shape s : makeCrossShapes(projPnts)) {
080                        for (Shape s : makeQuads(projPnts)) {
081                                ola.addShape(s);
082                        }
083                }
084
085                // draw the observed image (corner) points as circles:
086                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, CornerMarkColor.getColor()));
087                Point2D[][] obsPoints = ZhangData.getAllObservedPoints();
088                for (int i = 0; i < obsPoints.length; i++) {
089                        int sliceNo = i + 1;
090                        ola.setStackPosition(sliceNo);
091                        for (Shape s : makeCircleShapes(obsPoints[i])) {
092                                ola.addShape(s);
093                        }
094                }
095
096                testIm.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
097        }
098
099        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
100
101        private List<Shape> makeQuads(Point2D[] pnts) {
102                List<Shape> shapes = new ArrayList<>(pnts.length);
103                // 4 successive points make a quad (projected rectangle)
104                for (int i = 0; i < pnts.length; i += 4) {
105                        Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
106                        path.moveTo(pnts[i].getX(), pnts[i].getY());
107                        for (int j = 1; j < 4; j++) {
108                                Point2D p = pnts[i + j];
109                                path.lineTo(p.getX(), p.getY());
110                        }
111                        path.closePath();
112                        shapes.add(path);
113                }
114                return shapes;
115        }
116
117        private List<Shape> makeCircleShapes(Point2D[] pnts) {  // , Color lineCol
118                final double r = CornerMarkRadius;
119                final double ofs = 0.5; // pixel offset (elements to be placed at pixel centers)
120                List<Shape> shapes = new ArrayList<>(pnts.length);
121                for (int j = 0; j < pnts.length; j++) {
122                        double x = pnts[j].getX();
123                        double y = pnts[j].getY();
124                        // OvalRoi circle = new OvalRoi(x - r + ofs, y - r + ofs, 2 * r, 2 * r) ;
125                        Shape circle = new Ellipse2D.Double(x - r, y - r, 2 * r, 2 * r);
126                        shapes.add(circle);
127                }
128                return shapes;
129        }
130
131        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
132
133        private boolean runDialog() {
134                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
135                gd.setInsets(0, 0, 0);
136                gd.addMessage(splitLines(40,
137                                "This plugin only displays the 5 sample view images, marks",
138                                "the (given) image corner points and projects the model's",
139                                "squares using the given view and camera parameters. No",
140                                "calibration is performed!"));
141
142                gd.addEnumChoice("Reference squares color", ProjectedModelColor);
143                gd.addEnumChoice("Corner mark color", CornerMarkColor);
144                gd.addNumericField("Corner mark radius", CornerMarkRadius, 1);
145
146                gd.showDialog();
147                if (gd.wasCanceled())
148                        return false;
149
150                ProjectedModelColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
151                CornerMarkColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
152                CornerMarkRadius = gd.getNextNumber();
153                return true;
154        }
155        
156}
